1160390.name: Neo Cab Original Soundtrack
1160390.description:
From Chicago-based producer Obfusc (Joseph X. Burke) comes the original soundtrack for Neo Cab, an album inspired by the vibes of a late-night cab ride, and in turn inspiring the writers, artists and coders at Chance Agency as they created the world of Los Ojos.

Los Ojos. "Automation City." The cool desert air mingling with the silent knowing of surveillance. The hum of passing Capra cars reverberating down empty streets. The oasis of another person, a stranger, a passenger, a driver; a caravan across the nocturnal desert of humanity.
